movements.tempo: Minuetto con un poco di moto (Trio)

sources.autograph: Paris, Bibl. de l'Opéra, Réserve 507 (14). 'Mese di Giugno 1794. Quartettino [per due violini, viola e violoncello di Luigi] Boccherini [compositor di camera di S.M. il Re di Prussia]'. The first violin and 'cello parts are not in the hand of Boccherini.
ms_copies_parts: Paris, Conservatoire, D. 11169, in the hand of Picquot, with a note: 'beau'
sources.first_edition: 1932, Kassel, Bärenreiter (separate parts; revised by Walter Upmeyer), with the erroneous number Op. 48 no. 2, no. 7 in L. Boccherini Ausgewählte Streichquartette

partial_notes: Page starts mid-entry for G.228 showing only second movement; G.229 is complete with all movement information visible
